text: tavada allahge masjidvala ohuge (suddha vu) namaya suvisuddha kirima valakva, eva apate hærimata utsaha karannanta vada imahat aparadhakaruvan kavarekda? biya bætimatbhavayen misa, evaye ætulu vimata ovunta ayitiyakma næta. (ese tibiyadi eyata viruddhava katayutu karana) ovunta melovehi avamanayayi. tavada paralovadida ovunta imahat vu danduvam æta
